profile:
Carpet Masters is an independent, locally owned and operated carpet cleaning company, serving our customers in Kitchener, Guelph, Waterloo, Cambridge and surrounding areas since 2011. We’re certified by the IICRC (Institute of Inspection, Cleaning and Restoration Certification). We are proud to provide residential and commercial carpet cleaning services, as well as area rug cleaning, upholstery cleaning, mattress cleaning, odour removal, dryer vent cleaning and tile and grout cleaning.
 
Our team of carpet cleaners is professionally trained, reliable and trustworthy, offering amazing value and impeccably high standards of cleaning. And we’re bonded and fully insured, for your peace of mind.
 
We provide free, no obligation estimates of all of your carpet cleaning, upholstery cleaning, area rug cleaning, mattress cleaning and tile/grout cleaning requirements. And, we ensure that you are 100% satisfied… guaranteed!
 
Contact Us today to discuss your needs and a free estimate. We look forward to cleaning your world!
services: We are proud to provide residential and commercial carpet cleaning services, as well as area rug cleaning, upholstery cleaning, mattress cleaning, odour removal, dryer vent cleaning and tile and grout cleaning. Call us for Pet Odour Removal as well.
specialities:
At Carpet Masters, we’re proud to use the RotoVac Carpet Restoration Cleaning System for all of our professional carpet, upholstery and mattress cleaning services.

Rotovac Features and BenefitsRotovac’s patented vacuum heads use Rotary Jet Extraction, which thoroughly cleans carpet fibres from all directions, with hundreds of cleaning passes per minute. It produces dramatically superior cleaning results, with minimal drying time, restoring even the most heavily soiled carpets.

Whether you’ve had a terrible grape soda explosion in the living room, or you feel like you’re suffering from hay fever 365 days a year, the Rotovac System will thoroughly clean the carpet fibres in your home or business. It’s reliable results will leave you amazed! And we’re so confident, we ensure that you are 100% satisfied.
payment_method: Credit Card, Cash, Cheque and e-transfer
warranty_terms: 30 DAY Warranty. Please ask for details.
